title: Love, Simon
writer: Becky Albertalli, Elizabeth Berger, Isaac Aptaker
short_cast: Nick Robinson, Katherine Langford, Miles Heizer, Jennifer Garner, Josh Duhamel, Talitha Eliana Bateman, Tony Hale, Alexandra Shipp, Logan Miller, Keiynan Lonsdale, Mackenzie Lintz, Natasha Rothwell, Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Clark Moore

desc: High schooler Simon isn’t ready to reveal that he’s gay. While trying to keep his secret, he searches for the identity of his anonymous online crush.
